questions.question: Considering the nutritional label's prominent display, what is the primary food category represented by this product?
Based on the visible text, what specific cut of beef is prominently featured in this product?
Observing the nutrition facts, what is the total caloric content per serving of this packaged food?
Analyzing the ingredient list, which ingredient is explicitly highlighted due to its potential for allergies?
According to the nutrition facts, what is the amount of protein in grams per serving of this food item?
Examining the text, what is one of the listed preparation methods used for the main protein component?
Based on the nutrition facts, what is the amount of total fat in grams contained in a single serving?
What specific type of oil is listed as an ingredient within the garlic aioli component?
Referring to the ingredients, what type of vinegar is included in the preparation of the aioli?
What is the serving size, as indicated on the packaging label, expressed in grams?
According to the label's cautionary statement, what other common food allergens might this product have been prepared with?
From the ingredients list, identify one type of powder used in the creation of the product.
What is the primary type of starch indicated amongst the ingredients?
Based on the ingredient list, what kind of broth is used as a component of this food product?
What is one kind of pepper identified in the ingredient listing?
